title: Dawn's Keeper
description: Third in the Enforcers and Coterie series, Dawn's Keeper delves deeper into a world where magic co-exists peacefully with the ordinary, for the most part...Against his better judgment, Elijah agrees to help an ancient vampire with a mysterious problem. Too bad Dawn wants nothing to do with him. Prickly and evasive, she rebuffs him until she has no other choice.Dawn doesn’t want or need the help of a mere human. She’s survived countless battles since the dawn of civilization. But now she’s being stalked and spied on in her own home. Can she rely on the resourceful yet enigmatic Elijah, or is he one of them?Secrets brought them together. But secrets may destroy the fragile trust growing between them. She is an ancient warrior, a protector of vampires. And he...is not human.
author: Veronica Del Rosa
